heading: Pushkar
overview: Pushkar is a city, near Ajmer City and headquarters of Pushkar tehsil in the Ajmer district in the Indian state of Rajasthan. It is situated about 10 km northwest of Ajmer and about 150 kilometres southwest of Jaipur. It is a pilgrimage site for Hindus and Sikhs. Pushkar has many temples
inclusion3: Entrance fees (Cable and car and Moon Valley)
inclusion4: Box lunch water, banana apple and chocolate

itinerary.day1Heading: Pushkar Day 1: Arrival and Spiritual Exploration
itinerary.day1Overview: Embark on a soul-enriching journey as you drive to Pushkar. Upon arrival, immerse yourself in the sacred vibes of this mystical town. Check-in at the hotel and let the spirituality of Pushkar captivate you. Take a stroll around the holy Pushkar Lake, a place revered by pilgrims for centuries. Visit the renowned Brahma Temple, the only temple dedicated to Lord Brahma in the world. Feel the divine energy and serenity that surrounds this spiritual haven. The day is free for your own spiritual exploration and leisure activities. In the evening, witness the mesmerizing Aarti at Pushkar Lake, a soul-soothing experience. Dinner & overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day2Overview: After a hearty breakfast, delve into the vibrant atmosphere of the Pushkar Camel Fair. Marvel at the spectacle of thousands of camels, adorned in colorful attire, creating a kaleidoscope of tradition and culture. Immerse yourself in the unique cultural events, from camel races to traditional performances. Explore the lively markets offering a myriad of handicrafts, textiles, and local delights. In the evening, find solace by the Pushkar Lake, where the tranquil surroundings provide a perfect backdrop for reflection. Dinner & overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day3Overview: Bid farewell to the enchanting town of Pushkar after a delightful breakfast. As you drive towards Jaipur (145 Kms / 3 Hrs), relish the memories of the unique experiences and cultural richness Pushkar has offered. Reach Jaipur and conclude your memorable journey, carrying with you the essence of spirituality and the vibrant spirit of Pushkar.
